actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Agriculture Act of 1949 to require that the announcement by the Secretary of Agriculture with respect to a set-aside of cropland used in the production of feed grains be made no later than October 15 of each year for crops harvested in the next succeeding calendar year.

summary.text: Amends the Agriculture Act of 1949 to require the Secretary of Agriculture to announce a set-aside of feed grain cropland, if appropriate, no later than October 15 (currently November 15) of each calendar year for the crop harvested in the next calendar year.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agriculture Act of 1949 to require that the announcement by the Secretary of Agriculture with respect to a set-aside of cropland used in the production of feed grains be made no later than October 15 of each year for crops harvested in the next succeeding calendar year.
